trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that supports distributed transactions and secure, reliable sessions.
The wsHttpBinding is a secure, reliable, interoperable binding suitable for non-duplex service contracts.
trans-unit.target: O wsHttpBinding é uma associação segura, confiável e interoperável adequada para contratos de serviço não-duplex.

trans-unit.source: The binding implements the following specifications: WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability and WS-Security for message security and authentication.
trans-unit.target: A associação implementa as seguintes especificações: WS-ReliableMessaging de confiabilidade e WS-Security para autenticação e segurança de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The transport is HTTP and message encoding is Text/XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: O transporte é HTTP e a codificação de mensagem é texto/XML codificação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> class.
The configuration name of the binding.
This value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the WCF client will automatically store and resend any cookies sent by a single web service.
<see langword="True" /> if automatic cookies processing is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> se o processamento automático de cookies for necessário; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A> to `true` is useful when a client is interacting with one web service that uses cookies.
trans-unit.target: Configuração <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A> para `true` é útil quando um cliente está interagindo com um serviço web que usa cookies.

trans-unit.source: If you are accessing multiple services with the same cookie, set <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A> to `false` and you will have to manually add the cookie header to each outgoing message.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver acessando vários serviços com o mesmo cookie, defina <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A> para `false` e você terá que adicionar manualmente o cabeçalho do cookie para cada mensagem de saída.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to do this:
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como fazer isso:

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this binding element.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of this binding element.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> desse elemento de associação.

trans-unit.source: A binding element.
Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.
A collection of binding elements.
Called when the content of a specified binding collection is applied to this binding configuration element.

Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.

A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instância que contém uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objetos que podem ser atributos ou <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objetos deste elemento de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of security to be used with this binding.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpSecurityElement" /> that is used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpSecurityElement" /> que é usado com esta associação.
